No. 2,140. THE STATE OF MONTANA ex rel. CHARLES P. NEVIN, Relator, v. THE SECOND JUDICIAL DISTRICT COURT, IN AND FOR THE COUNTY OF SILVER BOW et al., Respondents. Mr. J. Bruce Kremer, for Relator. Mr. T. J. Walsh, for Respondents.
